name: Dice Farmer: Apotheosis
description:
Use your tools to plant and improve your dice.

Match pairs of dice to get more uses of your tools.

Match dice on their highest face to merge them into larger dice.

Left click to move dice, right click to use tools, number keys to select tools.

Each new die type unlocks new music and a new tool! Two Endings to discover!

Credits
